item.title: Blocks
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I’m really confused, I get that instance blocks and static blocks are alternatives to a constructor, but what is the difference between a static block and a normal block? I’m talking about:

static { // shit here }

{ // shit here }

Read full topic
